item.title: Evolution of Internet Users from 1990 - 2012
item.description: An animated scatterplot showing the evolution of Internet users across the worlds countries from 1990 to 2012 created with the D3.js.

item.title: Which Software Platforms are Exploited the Most
item.description: A pack layout visualization of platforms sized by the number of exploits created with the JavaScript library D3 and data from the Exploit Database.
